mapper.select: SELECT rh.reporter_member_id AS memberId, ru.user_name AS memberName, COUNT(*) AS reportCount FROM report_history rh JOIN member m ON rh.reporter_member_id = m.member_id JOIN user ru ON m.member_id = ru.user_id GROUP BY rh.reporter_member_id ORDER BY reportCount DESC LIMIT #{req.size} OFFSET #{req.offset}

SELECT rh.target_member_id AS memberId, tu.user_name AS memberName, SUM(rt.report_level) AS reportScore FROM report_history rh JOIN report_type rt ON rh.report_type_id = rt.report_type_id JOIN member m ON rh.target_member_id = m.member_id JOIN user tu ON m.member_id = tu.user_id GROUP BY rh.target_member_id ORDER BY reportScore DESC LIMIT #{req.size} OFFSET #{req.offset}
